casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Eric Glenn LANE. No. 606A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 10, 2008. Ann B. Petersen, Chapel Hill, for Eric Glenn Lane. Robert Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, C. Branson Vickory, III, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 13th day of March 2008 by Defendant to Fire Attorney, Ann B. Petersen:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 10th day of April 2008."
